title: PC font named LEO
content:
i'm looking for this font, i guess it's a PC font. and the customer is so lame they can't figure out how to copy   
the font to disk. any help? PC or Mac, but prefere Mac.   
thanks   
steve
author: deadbeat

comments.content: any kind of help guys? it's kind of a calligraphy style font. ??????

Can you post a sample? (Maybe of the   
client's old work?)
